hero.title: Simplified Booking
hero.description: Welcome to FindMyPro, your app for managing appointments with service providers.

about.title: About FindMyPro
about.description: FindMyPro is the ultimate solution for organizing your appointments with service providers. Our app is designed to streamline your scheduling process and improve your overall experience.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.quote: I highly recommend FindMyPro! It’s a real game-changer for how I manage my service bookings.

testimonial2.name: John Smith
testimonial2.quote: An excellent platform that has transformed the way I manage appointments. I couldn’t be happier!
